title: About Me
text: Senior DevOps Engineer with extensive experience designing and automating cloud-native infrastructure, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and improving reliability across large-scale production environments.

title: Inigo’s Deep Learning Blog
text: Here I will post topics about Deep Learning, MLOps and ML Platform engineering. Lessons learned and stuff I find interesting along the way.

title: DL_Py_25
text: Aquí publicare las tareas, ejercicios y temas vistos en el curso de Deep Learning 2025 impartido por el Doctor Héctor Manuel Garduño Castañeda a través la organización educativa de SciData Math
